Name: Afternoon empire
About the game: This is a 'click' game Put equipment on, then you can mine resources, resources can be used for manufacture and recruit You can sell productions at storage and get gold, gold can be used for upgrading, building, buying research point Upgrading and Counsellor Camp can unlock soldier, soldier can be used for conquest 2020-10-30 update information this is a small game, we do not expect much. so all the negative reviews, we did not take it very seriously. lately, we plan to publish another game, and we intend to do it with a new publisher. but, after all the negative reviews in 2018, players keep buying for two years like they never see these reviews. why?we can only guess, and one thought cross our mind : they may think 'maybe the game developer is a small studio without much support, and they keep making games because they love game too, let me support them so they can make a good game someday, maybe' we do not want to disappoint these players so, the new game will be publish with this account, and 'afternoon empire' will be remake, those who had bought it, can play it for free.
